update t_plasmid_info set plasmid_identification = #{plasmid_identification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plasmid_name = #{plasmid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plasmid_size = #{plasmid_size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lab_name = #{lab_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plasmid_type = #{plasmid_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plasmid_user_restriction = #{plasmid_user_restriction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plasmid_submit_type = #{plasmid_submit_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plasmid_sequence = #{plasmid_sequence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gene_name = #{gene_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gene_alias = #{gene_alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gene_identification = #{gene_identification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gene_mutation = #{gene_mutation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gene_species = #{gene_species,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gene_size = #{gene_size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gene_tag = #{gene_tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gene_terminal = #{gene_terminal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vector_backbone = #{vector_backbone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vector_backbone_manufactor = #{vector_backbone_manufactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vector_type = #{vector_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vector_backbone_size = #{vector_backbone_size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clone_promoter = #{clone_promoter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clone_method = #{clone_method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clone_site = #{clone_site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clone_sequence_primer = #{clone_sequence_primer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, growth_bacterial_resistance = #{growth_bacterial_resistance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, growth_strain = #{growth_strain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, growth_copy_number = #{growth_copy_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, growth_temperature = #{growth_temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, growth_selection_mark = #{growth_selection_mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, att_urls = #{att_urls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deposit_id = #{deposit_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vector_modifications = #{vector_modifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gene_link = #{gene_link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{add_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select pi.id as id, plasmid_identification, plasmid_name, gene_name, gene_species,vector_type, gene_mutation,growth_bacterial_resistance from t_plasmid_info pi LEFT JOIN t_goods g ON pi.id = g.product_id WHERE g.status = 1
AND
growth_bacterial_resistance LIKE "%"#{item}"%"
AND
plasmid_type LIKE "%"#{item}"%"
AND
vector_type LIKE "%"#{item}"%"
AND
gene_species LIKE "%"#{item}"%"
AND ${column_name1} LIKE "%"#{column_value1}"%"
AND ${column_name2} LIKE "%"#{column_value2}"%"
AND ${column_name3} LIKE "%"#{column_value3}"%"
AND ( plasmid_identification LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR plasmid_name LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR plasmid_type LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR plasmid_description LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR gene_name LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR gene_species LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR gene_mutation LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR gene_identification LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR gene_alias LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR gene_tag LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR vector_backbone LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR growth_bacterial_resistance LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR growth_strain LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR growth_selection_mark LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR lab_name LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR source_article LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" ) ORDER BY plasmid_identification ASC
